title.en: Merched y Wawr Bro Gwili Branch fundraising for charity
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Bro Gwili yn cefnogi achos da

description.en:
Mi fu aelodau Cangen Bro Gwili o Ferched y Wawr ar daith gerdded i godi arian i elusen Cymorth Canser Macmillan a dyma lun trosglwyddo y sieciau.
O’r chwith i’r due:-
Ann Jones,Ann Davies,Elsie Jones,Dinah Hughes, Menna Griffiths, Margaret Davies,Ann Wyke,Mair Thomas,Nivina Davies,Hettie Lewis,
Cynrychiolydd McMillan(dim Enw),Doreen Nicholas, Eira Davies, Emma Brown o Barclays,Dilys Reynolds, Margaret Griffiths, Sulwen Jones
description.cy:
